CustomField.description: Recipients marked as "Delegator to Certified Recipient" may review the document but can't acknowledge the document. They need to forward the document to another user who may acknowledge the document.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Recipients marked as "Delegator to Certified Recipient" may review the document but can't acknowledge the document. They need to forward the document to another user who may acknowledge the document.
CustomField.label: Enable Delegate Certified Recipient Role
